title: 2.4 Master Challenge 1
question: A certain book was priced at $15. If the price of the book was reduced by 20%, what would be its new price? Write a Python program to calculate the recent price.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
